page.title: 19 INDUSTRY
page.content: We have several businesses within our small area at present. The Heating & Electrical engineer's (Aylward's) and Farm Engineering serve domestic and industrial customers. There are three small Building firms,the longest established being T.Smith & Son, which has been in existence since 1867 and has built many houses in the Village. A Building Services & Plant Hire firm now operates from The Green. Several people are self-employed in the Painting & Decorating line and in electrical and computer services. In Perry we have a fine example of cottage industry in 'Darwin Pottery'. It supplies personalised, individual items as well as satisfying bulk orders from its customers. The Anglia Water Authority employs a small workforce in and around its Treatment Works in East Perry.
